ModMetaData.name: SeedsPlease
ModMetaData.author: notfood
ModMetaData.description: Seeds for your immersion pleasure. Included support for mods: - Alpha Biomes - Crusty Peanuts RimCuisine 2 - Cupros Drinks Soda - EP Soybeans - Nature is Pretty Sweet - T Expanded Crops - VGP Garden Drinks - VGP Garden Fabrics - VGP Garden Gourmet - VGP Garden Medicine - VGP Garden Resources - VGP More Veggies - VGP Three Sisters - VGP Vegetable Garden - VGP Xtra Flowers
